author: metasim
msg: Added warning about incompatibility with vm version "Blackdown-1.3.0-RC1".

author: metasim
msg: Added TargetMonitor widget which gives a better indication of what targets will
be built if a build is launched. Also fixed a few buglets in the PropertyEditor.

author: metasim
msg: Added scripts for launching Antidote, and updated the build file to make better
use of the Ant build directory for libraries, etc.

author: bodewig
msg: Make **/CVS/** a pattern in the list of default excludes instead of
**/CVS/*. This is to support users using cvs edit.
